name: Power Pete
overview: At the Toy Mart, the lights go out and bone-hurling cavemen, evil clowns, and crazed robots are among the bad toys who are out to attack and take over. The player takes the role of Power Pete, who must go through 15 levels while rescuing fuzzy bunnies and taking out the bad toys. The game has full speech with Pete spouting funny remarks throughout. The player has an arsenal of weapons such as gum ball blaster, pies, suction cups, and even flamethrowers. There are keys to collect along the way to open up differently colored doors. The player can use radar to locate where the fuzzy bunnies are. There are also power-ups such as speed, force field, stop time, and fire in the hole. The game can be played in single player or two player mode by players taking turns with their own hero.
